about_the_game:
"The Eldritch Ascent" Is a new grimdark fantasy narrative driven turn based game. Explore and battle your way up the twisted spire as the Eldritch, a wretched lost soul brought back from the depths by a mysterious demon. Demo coming soon, check out the game's website to join the mailing list for updates and follow the steam page.


Features

  • Ascend The Tower - Fight your way through the mysterious Tower of Trials, where each floor brings tougher enemies and greater challenges. Face hordes of enemies as you climb, building your strength and strategy to reach the top!

  • Unlock Powerful Skills: Choose skills wisely to create your own fighting style and adapt to the ever-changing threats within the tower. Challenge powerful boss enemies at key levels, each with their own unique moves and patterns.

  • Unravel The Story: Uncover a gripping narrative as you progress, with story elements unfolding on each floor. Meet allies, encounter rivals, and piece together the history of the tower as you climb towards its peak.

    "Amidst the creeping shadows of the insidious tower, despair is not an escape but a promise fulfilled."

name: The Eldritch Ascent

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: 2+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display.
